text: Devit tughav ikia garima, gumazamiziba arua zuima, ofa gamir gumazimning Sadok ko Abiatar, ko Livaiba me uaghan me ko zui. Livaiba Godɨn Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavimɨn Boksiam gisaghpugha iza nguazim gatɨ, egha uam a gisaghpuzir puvatɨgha, ikia ghuava dughiar gumazamiziba bar Jerusalem ataghizimɨn oto.
